section.name: Commons-lang builders
section.p: Jakarta commons-lang provides a convenient way for building consistent equals(Object), toString(), hashCode(), and compareTo(Object) methods. Commons-lang builders are robust and flexible. Probably the most useful builder is the toString() one, which helps you in creating consistent and configurable (through the use of a ToStringStyle object) toString() methods in your project.
